00016 TEST(SentenceTest, morphemeDefault) {
00017     Morpheme morpheme;
00018 
00019     EXPECT_EQ("", morpheme.lexicon_);
00020     EXPECT_EQ(-1, morpheme.posCode_);
00021     EXPECT_EQ("", morpheme.posStr_);
00022     EXPECT_EQ("", morpheme.baseForm_);
00023     EXPECT_EQ("", morpheme.readForm_);
00024     EXPECT_EQ("", morpheme.normForm_);

00027 TEST(SentenceTest, getDefault) {
00028     Sentence sent;
00029 
00030     EXPECT_STREQ("", sent.getString());
00031     EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getListSize());
00032     EXPECT_EQ(-1, sent.getOneBestIndex());
00033 }

00035 TEST(SentenceTest, getValue) {
00036     Sentence sent;
00037 
00038     MorphemeList morphList1;
00039     morphList1.push_back(Morpheme("lexicon11", 1, "noun", "base11", "read11", "norm11"));
00040     morphList1.push_back(Morpheme("lexicon12", 2, "verb", "base12", "read12", "norm12"));
00041     sent.addList(morphList1, 0.2);
00042 
00043     MorphemeList morphList2;
00044     morphList2.push_back(Morpheme("lexicon21", 3, "adj", "base21", "read21", "norm21"));
00045     morphList2.push_back(Morpheme("lexicon22", 4, "adv", "base22", "read22", "norm22"));
00046     morphList2.push_back(Morpheme("lexicon23", 5, "punct", "base23", "read23", "norm23"));
00047     sent.addList(morphList2, 0.8);
00048 
00049     MorphemeList morphList3;
00050     sent.addList(morphList3);
00051 
00052     EXPECT_EQ(3, sent.getListSize());
00053     EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getOneBestIndex());
00054 
00055     int i = sent.getOneBestIndex();
00056     EXPECT_EQ(3, sent.getCount(i));
00057     EXPECT_STREQ("lexicon21", sent.getLexicon(i, 0));
00058     EXPECT_STREQ("lexicon22", sent.getLexicon(i, 1));
00059     EXPECT_STREQ("lexicon23", sent.getLexicon(i, 2));
00060     EXPECT_EQ(3, sent.getPOS(i, 0));
00061     EXPECT_EQ(4, sent.getPOS(i, 1));
00062     EXPECT_EQ(5, sent.getPOS(i, 2));
00063     EXPECT_STREQ("adj", sent.getStrPOS(i, 0));
00064     EXPECT_STREQ("adv", sent.getStrPOS(i, 1));
00065     EXPECT_STREQ("punct", sent.getStrPOS(i, 2));
00066     EXPECT_STREQ("base21", sent.getBaseForm(i, 0));
00067     EXPECT_STREQ("base22", sent.getBaseForm(i, 1));
00068     EXPECT_STREQ("base23", sent.getBaseForm(i, 2));
00069     EXPECT_STREQ("read21", sent.getReadForm(i, 0));
00070     EXPECT_STREQ("read22", sent.getReadForm(i, 1));
00071     EXPECT_STREQ("read23", sent.getReadForm(i, 2));
00072     EXPECT_STREQ("norm21", sent.getNormForm(i, 0));
00073     EXPECT_STREQ("norm22", sent.getNormForm(i, 1));
00074     EXPECT_STREQ("norm23", sent.getNormForm(i, 2));
00075     EXPECT_EQ(0.8, sent.getScore(i));
00076     sent.setScore(i, 0.64);
00077     EXPECT_EQ(0.64, sent.getScore(i));
00078 
00079     i = 0;
00080     EXPECT_EQ(2, sent.getCount(i));
00081     EXPECT_STREQ("lexicon11", sent.getLexicon(i, 0));
00082     EXPECT_STREQ("lexicon12", sent.getLexicon(i, 1));
00083     EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getPOS(i, 0));
00084     EXPECT_EQ(2, sent.getPOS(i, 1));
00085     EXPECT_STREQ("noun", sent.getStrPOS(i, 0));
00086     EXPECT_STREQ("verb", sent.getStrPOS(i, 1));
00087     EXPECT_STREQ("base11", sent.getBaseForm(i, 0));
00088     EXPECT_STREQ("base12", sent.getBaseForm(i, 1));
00089     EXPECT_STREQ("read11", sent.getReadForm(i, 0));
00090     EXPECT_STREQ("read12", sent.getReadForm(i, 1));
00091     EXPECT_STREQ("norm11", sent.getNormForm(i, 0));
00092     EXPECT_STREQ("norm12", sent.getNormForm(i, 1));
00093     EXPECT_EQ(0.2, sent.getScore(i));
00094     sent.setScore(i, 0.32);
00095     EXPECT_EQ(0.32, sent.getScore(i));
00096 
00097     i = 2;
00098     EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getCount(i));
00099 }
